name: Females Against Violence (FAV): Leadership & Empowerment Program
description: Femmes Against Violence (FAV) is a 5-month, gender-affirming program for femme-identified, gender-expansive youth of color (14-20). Meeting three times a week, participants explore identity, healing, and leadership through cultural teachings, youth-led projects, and sisterhood. Our model blends knowledge, theory, practice, action, and support, empowering youth to address gender-based violence and systemic oppression.
